channel.title: Increase number of evil people or nerfing the priest?
channel.description:
Right now you can have about 4-5 uncovertable BD king prince priest alchemists priest res target
1 way to deal with it is to nerf priest, for example remove night immune
another way is to improve evil: make unseen max to 4 make cult max 5
because now, BD can just chill, wait until they have all the numbers and just execute all convertable targets.
I think a better answer is to buff evil and not nerf the priest

item.title: Increase number of evil people or nerfing the priest?
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Eran_Shmuel:

another way is to improve evil:

make unseen max to 4

make cult max 5

I would agree with the make Unseen cap to 4, but with the Cult, five would be a ridiculous number. Since they are based on a convert and kill pattern with their cooldowns, they are able to convert lots of people quickly, and when the Cult Leader is killed, it already gives rein to the next Cult Leader to convert. This is why they are likely not going to change the cap for the Cult. Unseen on the other hand… I guess we will wait and see.
